headline: Clinton Testifies on Epstein Ties as US-Cuba Maritime Incident Sparks Investigation

topStories.title: Hillary Clinton testifies before House Oversight Committee on Jeffrey Epstein investigation
topStories.summary: Former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton appeared before the House Oversight Committee to testify regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, marking a significant development in ongoing congressional scrutiny of connections to the late financier.

topStories.title: US-registered speedboat involved in deadly incident with Cuban coast guard
topStories.summary: A deadly maritime incident involving a US-registered speedboat and Cuban coast guard has prompted an investigation, raising questions about US-Cuba relations and maritime security in the Florida Straits.

topStories.title: US and Iran resume nuclear talks in Geneva amid ongoing diplomatic efforts
topStories.summary: The United States and Iran have resumed nuclear negotiations in Geneva as part of continued diplomatic efforts to address Iran's nuclear program, with mediators reporting some progress in discussions.

topStories.title: Mortgage rates fall below 6% for the first time in over three years
topStories.summary: US mortgage rates have dropped below 6% for the first time in more than three years, potentially providing relief to homebuyers and signaling shifts in the housing market and broader economic conditions.

topStories.title: Trump Administration freezes $259 million in Minnesota Medicaid funds over fraud concerns
topStories.summary: The Trump Administration has frozen $259 million in Minnesota Medicaid funding, citing fraud concerns, marking an early policy action affecting state healthcare programs.

topStories.title: NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani to meet with Trump in Washington, D.C.
topStories.summary: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani is scheduled to meet with President Trump in Washington, D.C., representing potential coordination between the federal administration and major city leadership.

emergingThemes: Jeffrey Epstein investigation expanding to include high-profile political figures
Early Trump administration policy actions affecting state programs and international relations
Economic indicators showing potential housing market shifts
Diplomatic engagement continuing on multiple international fronts
notableShifts: Congressional Epstein investigation escalating with testimony from former Secretary of State
US-Cuba relations facing new complications following maritime incident
Housing market dynamics potentially shifting as mortgage rates reach multi-year lows
Trump administration implementing immediate policy changes affecting state-federal relationships
